name: AMAZING HOI AN ON MOTORBIKE TOUR
description: Sign up Hoi An Locals Tours now to get the best experience of Hoi An in different aspect. You have a chance to ride motorbike by yourselves or with our friendly driver through peaceful of Hoi An countryside and traditional occupation villages for taking the best photos of Hoi An. Try to ride water buffalo at Hoi An green rice field. We also visit a local Buddhist pagoda to learn about Buddhism theory in Vietnam. We enjoy a little party with Hoi An Street Music at the local beach before transfer back to your hotel.
